name: Where in Termina are we? Quiz | Zelda Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: We've just earned the Gibdo Mask.  Where could we possibly be?
questions.explanation:
Ikana Canyon.

	The Gibdo Mask was given to us by Pamela's father.  We needed to play the Song of Healing to earn it.  Now, we can talk to the Gibdos beneath the well.

questions.text: Where are we if we've just watched the Indigo-Gos in concert?
questions.explanation:
Zora Hall.

	Zora Hall is the headquarters and living area for the famous Zora rock band, the Indigo-Gos.  The band consists of Lulu, Mikau, Evan, Japa, and Tijo.

questions.text: Where did we just get our new pictograph box?
questions.explanation:
The southern swamp.

	We earned our pictograph box by riding the southern swamp boat cruise.  This nifty little trinket will be useful in many parts of the game.

questions.text: We've just finished getting all of Lulu's eggs from the Pirate Fortress.  Where are we if we're getting the last three eggs?
questions.explanation:
Pinnacle Rock.

	To get to Pinnacle Rock, we needed to get a seahorse from Great Bay Coast.  Once there, we can get the eggs, rupees, and a piece of heart.

questions.text: We're in the moon now.  What dungeon are we in if we just paid three masks to enter it?
questions.explanation:
Zora Dungeon.

	The Zora Dungeon features many pipes that we need to swim through.  The ways we take determine if we'll end up at the exit, a dead end, or at a piece of heart.

questions.text: We've just rescued fifteen faeries to get a spell which doubles the damage we can take.  What temple did we get these faeries in?
questions.explanation:
Great Bay Temple.

	We take the fifteen faeries to the Fairy's Fountain on the Great Bay Coast to double the damage we can take.  We need the hookshot and bombs to get into the fountain.

questions.text: We've just found where the skull kid left Epona, so that means that we are at Gorman Track.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Skull kid left Epona at Romani Ranch.  Gorman Track is the rival stable to Romani Ranch.  At Romani Ranch, we can earn many different things, and we can get Epona back.

questions.text: Where are we if we've just upgraded our Razor Sword to the Gilded Sword?
questions.explanation:
Mountain Village.

	The Mountain Smithy needs one hundred rupees for the forging, but to make the gilded sword, we'll also need to get gold powder by winning at the Goron Racetrack in the spring.

questions.text: In what dungeon do we fight Twinmold?
questions.explanation:
Stone Tower Temple.

	To fight Twinmold, we need the Giant's Mask to make us big.  After this, we can summon the giants on the clock tower with the Oath to Order.

questions.text: What section of Clock Town gives us direct access to the Laundry Pool?
questions.explanation:
South Clock Town.

	In the Laundry Pool, we can get the Bremmen Mask, we can access the Curiosity Shop, and we can also retrieve the town's fairy during the day.
